references.reason: This paper introduces Classifier-Free Guidance (CFG), a crucial technique for improving conditional image generation in diffusion models, and is cited heavily in the paper (mentioned 16 times).

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), a groundbreaking approach for high-resolution image synthesis, serving as a foundation for stable diffusion and being mentioned 14 times in the paper.

references.paper_title: Hopfield networks is all you need
references.reason: This paper demonstrates that Hopfield networks can be integrated into deep learning layers, serving as a theoretical basis for the paper and is mentioned 14 times.

references.paper_title: From softmax to sparsemax: A sparse model of attention and multi-label classification
references.reason: This paper introduces sparsemax, a sparse alternative to softmax, which is used as a part of the core contribution of the paper and is mentioned 13 times.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces score-based generative models, a framework crucial to the understanding and development of diffusion models, and is cited 3 times in the document.
